events.name: 25° Ethereum Milano meetup
#161 [Intermediate] Setting up a hosted Ethereum node (#2)
events.description:
In the last workshop we set up an Ethereum node on a virtual hosted server.
It's a quick catch-up if you missed it, but we'll continue to enhance the deployment with APIs, website, etc.

Previous write-up...
In this workshop we'll be setting up a node (or few) roughly following [https://github.com/bokkypoobah/BokkysCheatsheet/wiki/Ethereum-Node-Setup-On-A-Virtual-Server](these instructions), and documenting updated steps along the way.

Chat history from workshop Telegram channel:
"ETH Mainnet node on Linode 16Gb 6 Cores 320 GB SSD 8 TB transfers USD 80/mo.
Ropsten node on Linode 8Gb 4 Cores 160 GB SSD 5 TB transfers USD 40/mo."
https://www.linode.com/pricing/

Currently looking at AWS t2.xlarge 4 vCPUs 16Gb for Ropsten
https://aws.amazon.com/ec2/instance-types/

Q: Less than 300 user transactrions a week?
A: If you are comfortable running your own virtual server, Linode 1Gb 1 Core 25 Gb SSD USD 5/mo will do.

To help cover the costs of food/drink, please bring a donation. Recommended $20/$10 note if you can, or almost can, afford it. (no worries if you can't)

---

Notes
• Workshops are often recorded for educational purposes and to eventually put online. Attendance is taken as consent.
• PSA: Please be mindful of open source and open community etiquettes. (eg, attributing the source of works that you build upon, and not "stealing" another person's project/idea for commercial gains)

---

Housekeeping:
• Meet 10 minutes before the start at 17:20, in the lobby of 155 Clarence Street, Sydney
• If arriving later, please ping the BokkyPooBah's Ethereum Workshop Chat (https://t.me/joinchat/Ep-XOkwa_umKWXXRBGBVVQ) group and someone will come down to get you
• There will be some refreshments. Donations to cover expenses: $20 (those who can afford it), $10 (those who can almost afford it), $0 (those who really cannot afford it).
• The topic details for these workshops can change up to the last minute
• If you have successfully RSVPed or are on the waitlist, please review your RSVP status and cancel your RSVP/waitlist ASAP if you cannot make it to free up the spot for other people
• People from Tyro do not have to RSVP
events.how_to_find_us: Meet in the ground floor lobby at 17:20

events.name: Ethereum Belgium Meetup : 3 decentralized web3 applications you can use today
events.description:
For our next meetup we will look at 3 very concrete use cases you can use today on the public Ethereum network:

- 3Box (https://3box.io/) is a decentralized platform that provides storage, messaging, social profile & sign-in. It progressed so fast that it can now reproduce the core feature of Facebook (https://medium.com/3box/introducing-3box-wall-7c299f4e0a1d) while you keep full control over your data.
- ENS (https://ens.domains/) domain name services (registry, registrars, and public resolvers) but based on Ethereum & with superpowers.
- Monolith (https://monolith.xyz/) an open-source, non-custodial, decentralised "bank" account base on Ethereum that come with a ... VISA card.

So after the usual 5 minutes introduction to Ethereum, We will look a those services both from the functional & technical point of view.

Of course drinks, food & stickers are forseen !

PS : you can also register on Eventbrite https://www.eventbrite.com/e/ethereum-belgium-3-decentralized-web3-applications-you-can-use-today-tickets-84599073105

#BUIDLnetwork #Blockchain #Ethereum #Web3
events.how_to_find_us: You can come by bus, train or just park your car around (it's a residential area there are usually a lot of spots & it's free)

events.name: 100x your dApp on Ethereum + SKALE | Singapore
events.description:
PLEASE RSVP HERE TOO: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/100x-your-dapp-on-ethereum-skale-singapore-tickets-85053265607

Hello Singapore! SKALE is excited to partner with StakeWith.US and ETH Singapore for this workshop.

About this Event
Join us if you want to learn how to make your dApps run at 100x the mainnet speed while staying fully decentralized.

In this workshop, you will learn how to deploy your Ethereum DApp to SKALE using your favorite developer tools (Truffle, Web3.js, ...) and run it with zero delays and subsecond block times in a completely gas-free environment.

Christine Perry, SKALE VP of Solutions Engineering, will explain SKALE technology and show how to build dApps on Ethereum + SKALE.

Agenda:

7.00 - 7.30 pm - Check-in, pizza, drinks, networking

7.30 - 8.15 pm - SKALE DApp Deployment workshop by Christine Perry

8.15 - 8.30 pm - Q&A

8.30 - 9.00 pm - More pizza and networking

Speaker:

Christine Perry

VP Solutions Engineering, SKALE Labs

http://skale.network/

Bio: Christine manages the customer success journey both pre and post-sales. This includes developing custom integrations, prototypes, delivering technical workshops and working with dApp developers and leading ecosystem growth projects.

SKALE Network:

The SKALE Network is an elastic, modular network of blockchains built with cutting edge threshold cryptography and containerization technology. The result is an easy-to-use, secure, fast, cost-effective decentralized cloud. With SKALE, dApps can deploy their own blockchain and configure it to their unique requirements.

Location: WeWork, 22 Cross St, Singapore[masked]

Directions:

- The main entry to WeWork is beside an overhead bridge, right next to Wang Dae Bak Korean BBQ Restaurant and What's Pide. Take the blue stairs up to the 2nd floor for the event.

- There is also a lift that they can enter via the lobby next to Wang Dae Bak or Capri by Fraser China Square
events.how_to_find_us: - The main entry to WeWork is beside an overhead bridge, right next to Wang Dae Bak Korean BBQ Restaurant and What's Pide. Take the blue stairs up to the 2nd floor for the event.

events.name: TEM 基礎教育課程第三階段：「跨出工程師只會寫 Code 的既有框架」
events.description:
想要了解區塊鏈技術，你一定聽過鼎鼎大名的台灣第一大的區塊鏈社群-台北以太坊，Taipei Eetherum Meetup 從 2016 年開始就默默地投注各種資源到社群裡，舉辦不下 50 場免費實體活動與實作工作坊，邀請研究者、開發者、國際公司來台分享。Medium 上累積了 162 篇專業文章與近 3000 名訂閱用戶。Taipei Ethereum Meetup 持續透過各種形式讓產業知識快速流通，培養台灣優秀區塊鏈人才，期許能夠對台灣有所貢獻。2019 年 10 月，更盛大舉辦 Crosslink 2019，邀請以太坊生態圈重磅講者到台灣與當地社群面對面交流。

請至活動通網頁報名 https://www.accupass.com/event/1911150750032715966110

【這堂課程是什麼？為什麼要開這門課？】

本課程著重在進入區塊鏈產業所需具備的基礎知識。

區塊鏈的技術是橫跨多領域所組成，並又接著在各領域知識的基礎上創新。從網路結構的外觀來看，系統以眾多節點以點對點架構組成，相異於主流日常生活用的網路服務的主從式架構。節點間對資料取得共識的機制也須追溯到分散式系統的研究。

在以太坊以來，客製化虛擬機以進行運算也成顯學，這塊又屬於編譯器的領域知識。不論在共識層或應用層，系統倚賴密碼學的工具。最後利用區塊鏈簿記上的資產進行獎勵或懲罰來讓系統參與者作出行動，需要經濟學上的工具。

即使在五年之前進入區塊鏈圈，要能夠一次把這所有的領域接觸過也非容易。這次課程取得在各自領域專精的講者，把每個領域重要的概念提過，並點出與區塊鏈關聯的重點。目標並非讓學習者能夠完全掌握所有的領域，而是

- 降低日後自行學習的障礙，知道可以從哪裡開始看
- 知道哪些領域有學習者自己領域能夠切入合作的缺口
- 知道各種領域的瓶頸及前沿研究是什麼

課程的安排除了前述眾領域的介紹，最後有一門「客戶端原始碼分析」，全節點便是整個抽象共識機制的具體軟體實作，有了前面的基礎，看到程式碼會比較知道背後設計的原因。

【講者是誰？】

此次邀請到的講者都在區塊鏈技術中至少深耕一年以上，對各自專精的議題已有獨到見解。

梁智程｜Ethereum Asia Pacific Limited 以太坊基金會研究員

戴宏穎 (海帶)｜Second State VP of engineering

林修平｜Ethereum Asia Pacific Limited 以太坊基金會研究員

邱駿 (Juin)｜Unitychain Lead Researcher

吳偉誠 (Kimi)｜Unitychain Developer

賈脈瑄｜Ethereum Asia Pacific Limited 以太坊基金會研究員

Miya Chen｜帳聯網路科技 (AMIS) Developer

【為什麼從以太坊開始學？】

以太坊鏈上的 Dapp ，不論是在數量或是應用的範圍上，皆遙遙領先其他主鏈。各大主流區塊鏈應用的衍生，也是以以太坊為基礎發展而成。 以太坊目前仍是區塊鏈中最具開源文化的生態系之一，技術支援也是所有公鏈中最完整的，有著最豐富的研究者社群與概念創新。

【課程時數與費用】

課程將分成三階段，每階段授課 12 小時，形式包含講課與實作。
每一階段 12 小時收費 $4,800 元，早鳥票 $3,600，三人團報價 $3,000/1 人。
課程人數最多 30 人為主，最低開班人數 10 人。

events.name: ETH 2.0 Phase 0: Towards Beacon Chain Mainnet with Prysmatic Labs
events.description:
Agenda:
6:00pm: Networking and Drinks
6:30pm: Towards Beacon Chain Mainnet

-----------------------------------------------------

Presentation: Towards Beacon Chain Mainnet with Terence Tsao

Ethereum 2.0 has been worked on for years, and has undergone innumerable iterations. It's a massive re-architecture of the Ethereum platform, involving new components such as proof of stake-based consensus, sharding, a WebAssembly-based VM, and more. These changes, if successful, will provide significant boosts to Ethereum's security, scalability, and decentralization. Prysmatic Labs is one of 8 teams building an ETH 2.0 client - the name of Prsymatic's client is Prysm.

Since his talk last May, Terence will give an update on the following topics:
• ETH2.0 Beacon chain spec changes
• Prysm Q4/2019 accomplishments
• Lessons learned from running Prysm single client testnet
• Current progress on a multi-client testnet
• ETH 2.0 phase 0 development
• Prysm's 2020 roadmap

*** This event is about the future of Ethereum as a whole, with one of its leading client engineering teams. Don't miss it! ***

-----------------------------------------------------

About the Meetup
The SF Ethereum Developers Meetup has hosted Ethereum and blockchain-related events since early 2016. We are committed to spreading knowledge about distributed ledger technology, especially as it pertains to smart contracts and public, decentralized Turing-complete computing platforms.

About the Venue Host
Starfish Mission is a hub for emerging tech communities with a focus on blockchain/Web3, based out of the mid-market area in San Francisco. As an organization, and network, Starfish is committed to creating spaces and learning networks for a community of builders, and doers. Offerings at Starfish include coworking and office space, curated industry events, and education. Reach out to them at [masked] or visit www.starfish.network.

-----------------------------------------------------

events.name: Global Computer Science Education Week 2019
events.description:
With less than few weeks into the year 2020, we are currently organising Lagos Ethereum Meetup, Nigeria from 13–14 December 2019.

This year Global Computer Science Education Week starts this monday 9th to sunday 15th December, 2019.

This event will reduce unemployment while proffering solution to the electoral challenges in Nigeria.

The duration of this boot-camp is eight weeks, with mentor-ship from the Consensys Academy and Wizard Amigos. Our speakers for 13th and 14th December, 2019 are BuidL Networks partners.
Like minds are welcome to collaborate in building a decentralised future using Ethereum. The occasion will be inclusive and educational, inspiring communities through the creative design of blockchain applications.

Lagos Ethereum Meetup is the perfect opportunity for individuals to expand on their current blockchain knowledge, network with key industry experts and gain valuable personal and business related insights.

We are calling on all technologists, change-makers, entrepreneurs, futurists, developers, economists and blockchain enthusiasts who would like to get involved. Anyone who would like to apply can do so via the links below:

Apply to join boot-camp, mentor or volunteer
www.codeconference.ng

(Please note that RSVP without applying, will not secure your participation.)

If you have any additional questions, please do not hesitate to reach out to us directly.
[masked]

events.name: Ethereum 2.0 – guide to start staking AND 3Box – portable user data for dapps
events.description:
Ethereum 2.0 - Chi-Hao Poon and Carl Gärdsell:
Ethereum is a global, open-source platform for decentralized applications built with Blockchain technology.

Ethereum’s Serenity upgrade will bring Sharding, Proof of Stake, a new virtual machine (eWASM) and more. It’s important to understand that this upgrade will not take place at a single point in time – instead, it will be rolled out in phases. We are going to talk about blockchain, what Phase 0 means, and how to become a validator.

3Box - Joel Torstensson:
Blockchains sparked an evolution in p2p technologies, but what does Web3 bring us beyond cryptocurrencies? 3Box is a tool that enables user-centric portable data that is compatible with dApps building on any blockchain, be it Ethereum, Cosmos, Polkadot, etc. This is enabled by combining the decentralized identity (DID) standard with sophisticated use of IPFS. Building user friendly dApps has been a challenge, but that is rapidly changing. #BuildBetter
events.how_to_find_us: Entry from the canal side, through the cafe.

events.name: Token Talk With Tracie - Enjin Coin
events.description:
In this Token Talk with Tracie session, we will discuss ENJIN . Enjin Coin (ENJ) is an Ethereum-based cryptocurrency used to directly back the value of next-generation blockchain assets.

Enjin, a company that helps over 20 million gamers create sandbox forums and communities around their favorite games. Enjin Coin extends this already-existing platform into a blockchain video game development engine.

The Singapore based company also announced a partnership with Samsung in 2019 that integrated its technology into South Korean Galaxy S10 models. This announcement sent the price skyrocketing and created a major media buzz.

Video games fuel a massive industry. According to the Entertainment Software Association (ESA), 75% of Americans have at least one gamer in their household, and 65% of American adults play video games.

Location

We’ll be on the 4th floor at The Attic

Parking:
Street Parking NORTH of Kennedy Avenue is free all after 6pm. Meters are enforced on Kennedy Avenue and all streets south.

COST:
This meetup is FREE for BlockSpaces members, and $10 for non-members.
To become a member please visit http://bit.ly/BlockSpaces_Membership

Follow us on Twitter: @BlockSpaces_io
Follow us on Facebook: @BlockSpaces

events.name: It's a Merry Merkle!
events.description:
Magic internet money is about more than getting rich online.

It's about changing the definition of wealth so that it has more to do with who can access it, how much we can all share, and how we choose to participate with the communities in which we find ourselves.

Given the recent protest action in Cape Town, we've decided to help vulnerable women and mothers through an awesome initiative called The Zoe Project.

Come and help #MerryMerkle - our annual Ethereum giving tradition - as we paint murals, install air-conditioners and complete other maintenance tasks at brick-and-mortar clinics in Cape Town. Get your hands dirty, and help raise magic money for something truly worthwhile.

You'll also get to be a part of a truly global campaign! Part of the money we raise globally will go to educating people in Brazilian favelas, as well as to Unicef's new Crypto Fund in our attempt make this a truly planetary tradition. Don't miss out on your opportunity to be a part of something bigger than just the next software release or twitter thread.

More details here:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MerkleMerry
Merry Merkel: https://merrymerkle.christmas/ (Without metamask)
Merry Merkel: https://merrymerkle.eth/ (With metamask)

About the Zoe Project: https://thezoeproject.co.za/

events.name: Beercoin : Bitcoin, Ethereum & cryptocurrencies
events.description:
Événement récurent.

On mange un bout en buvant une bière ou autre tout en parlant Bitcoin, Ethereum et globalement de blockchain.

Mais rassurez vous, nous ne sommes pas là pour tricoter avec les mots : il s'agit avant tout d'indépendance économique !

Si vous n'y connaissez rien, vous aurez droit à une solide introduction !

L'objectif est de se réunir dans un bar, généralement le jeudi soir; c'est l'occasion de créer des contacts entre nouveaux arrivants dans la communauté et de les conserver avec les anciens.

N'hésitez pas à m'envoyer un message si vous souhaitez y participer, présenter un projet, votre travail, etc...

Vous pouvez payer vos consos en bitcoin et si le patron ne les prend pas, on s'arrangera ! Si vous n'avez pas encore de bitcoins, n'hésitez pas à en demander.

Et comme d'habitude, venez parler sur
- https://slack.cryptofr.com

events.name: Regulations in Estonia concerning cryptocurrency companies and trading.
events.description:
TOPIC: "Regulations in Estonia concerning cryptocurrency companies and trading."
- Regulations at the moment; changes to regulations so far; plans for 2020
Exchanges
- Overview of different exchanges
My experience in trading and what I have learned along the way
- Foreign exchange trading companies
- Trading cryptocurrency on margin
- Shorting Bitcoin
This time the presentation is from Roman Pototksi who is Estonian with studies in International Business and founder of DeltaHeroes and Vita Pictura. He has worked in Trading as business client support and high value client support.

Ethereum ryhmäläiset ovat avanneet laajemmalle Blockchain yleisölle teknologian ja toimintojen seuraamisen koska yhä useammin ratkaisut ovat soveltuvia koko alalle. Roman Pototski esittelee nyt mitä on vaatimustenmukasuus Viron virtuaalivaluuttapörssissä nyt sekä arvioita tulevasta 2020. Hän vertailee myös muita pörssejä sekä kertoo kokemuksistaan "treidaajan" näkökulmasta.
Aiheena ovat erityisesti myös rahanpesun ehkäisy ja asiakkuuksien tunnistamisen haasteet.

TERVETULOA! - Markus Lehtonen -
